topic.title: Downloading Axis2C to the OpenTM2 Client PC

body.p: This chapter describes how to download Axis2c to the client PC.
Go to the web-site http://archive.apache.org/dist/ws/axis2-c/1_6_0/, and download the package axis2c-bin-1.6.0-win32.zip to your local hard disk drive. You may use e.g. a temporary directory.
body.note: Axis2c is not part of the installer package, but a 3rd party open source module used by .
